data.text:
He is not dead yet and still have things to say to the youth ! Chomsky Rocks and here are fun facts about the Public Enemy Number One :

1.Noam Chomsky, Public Enemy Number One

there was a time, you only needed pen, paper and your own opinion, you could become the Public enemy Number One.

This is what happens to Noam Chomsky when he starts saying what he thought about the Vietnam War and Richard Nixon.

Chomsky was on President Richard Nixon's 'Enemies List' wich is a list of political opponents because he protest against US involvement in the Vietnam War.

2.Quotes from and by Noam Chomsky

More than 100 books, 50 years of teaching at M.I.T, no surprise Noam Chomsky is one of the most cited scholar ! One of the most famous quote from him are :

“We shouldn't be looking for heroes, we should be looking for good ideas.”

― Noam Chomsky

“The more you can increase fear of drugs, crime, welfare mothers, immigrants and aliens, the more you control all of the people.”

― Noam Chomsky

“How it is we have so much information, but know so little?”― Noam Chomsky

3.Noam Chomsky Young

Avram Noam Chomsky was born in Philadelphia in 1928, the city of Liberty Bell and Rocky Balboa. Hes pemt his time in library reading political books.

From a Jewish family from russia, he faced antisemitism when he was 12 years old when WW2 started and Nazis captured Paris.

He wrote his first article about the spread of fascism (Spanish Franco) when he was ten years old.

4.Noam Chomsky and Bernie Sanders

Because Bernie Sanders is trying to shape US politics in the interest of the people , the working people ! An idea close to his Anarcho Syndicalism.

We shouldn’t expect anything else.

5.Noam Chomsky and Sam Harris

this is a long mail exchange (not a debate) to read between Harris and Chomsky. something about war ethics between a senior philosopher (chomsky) and a junior (Harris)

6.Manufactured consent by Noam Chomsky

This book reflect the Economy of the Mass Media,tv and newspapers full of lies to make the economy works !

And Noam's opinion is to deliver a Hammer blow to mass media !
